name: Don'tEscape!
description:
Don't Escape. An Escape game based on lies. Can you escape?
This game was created for the Community Game Jam 2019
The theme is: The Game Is A Liar

SPOILER:

For everyone stucked on the color puzzle here is the solution:

You have to use the color circle on the wall and combine that with the text on the wall. The cube is green and you have to add yellow to it.  So for the cube you have to look at the color circle which color is between green and yellow. So the cube has to be blue.
Do this for all of the objects.

Here is the complete solution:

1.Blue Cube

2. Purple Ball

3. Green Triangle
